Title: Relates to the minimum wage for employees with disabilities
Summary: Eliminates provisions exempting employees with disabilities from the minimum wage law; provides that laws or minimum wage orders that authorize an employer to pay a wage that is less than the minimum wage are valid provided that under such laws or orders an employee with a disability is paid the same wage as an employee in a comparable position that does not have a disability.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the minimum wage for employees with disabilities
